Explanation Detail: ""Airwars, in collaboration with the Sunday Times, has identified the names of 161 separate families who lost two or more family members in the Israel-Gaza war.""

Explanation Detail: ""In conjunction with the civilian harm monitoring organisation Airwars, the Guardian spoke with dozens of residents and gathered footage and photos to piece together the story of one building, al-Jalaa tower, demolished by an Israeli airstrike on 15 May 2021.""
